name: Parmesan Wasabi Mashed Potatoes
recipeIngredient: 2 pounds russet potatoes, about 4 large potatoes

recipeInstructions.text: Peel the potatoes and cut them into 1/2 inch chunks. Place potato chunks into a large pot and cover with cold water. Bring potatoes to a boil and boil until fork tender, 15-20 minutes. Drain potatoes and return to pot.
Add milk and butter and mash with a potato masher until desired consistency is reached. Add parmesan, wasabi, and salt and mix until all ingredients are combined.
